content: Yes, mergers and acquisitions are a common occurrence in the hospitality industry. This is because the industry is highly competitive, and companies are always looking for ways to expand their business and gain a competitive advantage. Mergers and acquisitions can help companies do this by allowing them to expand their portfolio of hotels, gain access to new markets, and increase their customer base. Additionally, the hospitality industry is a capital-intensive business, and mergers and acquisitions can provide companies with the necessary capital to fund growth and development.
